game.title: The Lost Temple
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient artifact from the lost temple
game.description: A legendary artifact is hidden within the lost temple, and it's up to you to retrieve it. Be warned: the temple is filled with treacherous traps and terrifying creatures.

tasks.objective: Find the entrance to the lost temple
tasks.description: The entrance is hidden behind a waterfall. Look for a small cave behind the falls.
tasks.location: Waterfall Cave, north of the town

tasks.description: Use your wits to avoid deadly traps and reach the artifact chamber.
A powerful beast guards the artifact. Be prepared for a fierce battle!
tasks.location: The Artifact Chamber, The Lost Temple
